home.name: Gabriel Menezes
home.bio:
Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative solutions.
Specialist in building scalable applications with <0>React</0>, <1>Node.js</1> and <2>Cloud Computing</2>.

frontend.title: Frontend Engineering
frontend.experience: Specialist in creating complex SPAs and interactive dashboards. With React and Next.js, I developed interfaces used by over 300k users, always focusing on performance, accessibility and fluid user experience (UX).

backend.title: Backend & Microservices
backend.experience: Robust experience in designing distributed systems. Designed microservices architectures using Pattern Service-per-Action with Java/Quarkus and Node.js, ensuring high availability and maintainability for large data volumes.

cloud.title: Cloud & DevOps
cloud.experience: Complete application lifecycle management. From containerization with Docker to reverse proxy configuration with Nginx and CI/CD pipelines, ensuring continuous delivery and stable production environments.

iot.title: IoT & Integration
iot.description: Connecting the physical world to the digital.
iot.experience: Development of secure communication protocols for industrial hardware. Implemented encryption (HMAC/Blowfish) and byte-level operations to ensure data integrity and security in field device communication.
